title: IDG Contributor Network: Why do websites take so long to load?
text:
IDG Contributor Network: Why do websites take so long to load? 
Published By: Computerworld.com - Today 
How long do you wait for a page to load before giving up?Five seconds?Three seconds?According to Slate, internet pages took about 30 seconds...
